title: The Bakery's Secret
description: The strange flour you delivered to the Hearth-Oven months ago has borne fruit. The baker is mass-producing a strange bread that causes aggressive euphoria in the Ward.

turns.narrative: The bakery is swarmed by desperate citizens. Thade is handing out the 'Joy-Loaves' for free.
turns.choice_a: Fight through the crowd to confront Thade
turns.consequence_a: The crowd violently defends him. You must incapacitate several civilians before reaching the shop.
turns.choice_b: Sneak in through the flour-chute on the roof
turns.consequence_b: You drop directly into the kitchen, avoiding the mob entirely.

turns.narrative: In the kitchen, Thade is mixing the dough with a glowing blue liquid—distilled Void-Wine.
turns.consequence_a: The vats shatter, spilling the volatile liquid. The fumes cause you to hallucinate violently during the ensuing fight.
turns.consequence_b: He surrenders, realizing he is caught. You secure the evidence without a fight.

vats_smashed.description: You destroyed the Void-Wine supply, stopping the production.

thade_arrested.description: You arrested Thade and secured the uncorrupted Void-Wine.

conclusion: You destroyed the Void-Wine supply, stopping the production.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences to the district and involved factions.
